title: Map Object Keys
description: In this lab, we will explore how to map the keys of an object using a provided function, generating a new object. We will use Object.keys() to iterate over the object's keys and Array.prototype.reduce() to create a new object with the same values and mapped keys using the provided function. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to transform an object's keys using JavaScript.

meta.title: Mapping Object Keys with JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to transform an object's keys using JavaScript functions.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, object, keys, javascript lab, mapping, javascript tutor, transformation

verify.name: Verify Node Commands History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
